Header.title: CAMWARE SPECIALIZATION
Header.paragraph: Leads to Technology, Products and Services

About.paragraph: is a startup EMS Company established in the year 2016 in Chennai, India, jointly by five engineers who perceived the concept of comprehensive solution in Electronic Manufacturing Services (EMS) under single roof.We determined to focus on the complete spectrum of state of the art and emerging technologies in EMS to bring a positive change in the arena of Electronics Manufacturing Industries. Presently, we have teamed up with competent professionals and skilled & qualified partners having expertise in the following domains
domains: Electronic Hardware Product Developement & Embedded Solutions
Offset Program for OEM products in India

Services.name: Smart Home
Services.text: Smart Home leads IoT with high search volumes and $2.5 billion funding, offering convenience through interconnected devices for home automation. With 256 companies dedicated to this field, it promises efficient living.

Services.name: Smart City
Services.text: Smart City solutions address urban challenges from traffic management to environmental monitoring, aiming for sustainable and livable cities. With diverse use cases, it attracts attention for improving urban quality of life.

Services.name: Smart Grids
Services.text: Smart Grids enhance electricity distribution efficiency and reliability through automation, with growing interest despite modest social media buzz. With 41,000 monthly searches, it signifies a push towards optimizing energy infrastructure.

Services.name: Connected Car
Services.text: The Connected Car market is evolving with major players investing in internet-connected vehicle solutions, poised to reshape automotive technology. As industry giants like Google, Microsoft, and Apple enter the arena, anticipation for its future grows.

Services.name: Connected Health
Services.text: Connected Health holds promise for healthcare innovation and improved patient outcomes, despite its current underwhelming adoption. With significant potential for impact, its growth trajectory is eagerly awaited.

Services.name: Smart Supply Chain
Services.text: Smart Supply Chain solutions aim to enhance logistics efficiency and visibility, though their popularity in IoT remains moderate. As IoT integration advances, further improvements in supply chain management are expected.
